author: Naomi Powell
title: Medical team revives decades-old ventilator model amid scramble to get Canada ready for COVID-19 peak
description: It's one of a handful of projects battling buckling global supply chains, overwhelming demand and export controls cutting off access to crucial parts
content:
When he retired from his lab at the University of Manitoba in 2001, Dr. Magdy Younes took little more than a set of electronic files, a few books and two bulky, sharp-cornered metal boxes fitted with flick switches and knobs.
Each about the size of a microwa… [+8113 chars]
